title: Would a God of War Netflix Series Work? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.29.20
description:
Thanks to G.I. Joe: War on Cobra for sponsoring us today! Download G.I. Joe: War on Cobra right now for FREE on your mobile device and choose a side for battle. Please use the link http://www.d3go.com/KFGames to download the game and receive your free Bazooka and Missile B.A.T. character in the game. Free gift is for new players 

Get a free stock today by going to http://games.robinhood.com

Would a God of War Netflix series work? Cory Barlog thinks so! Blessing and Tim sit down this episode to talk about what the potential of a God of War show could be.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:33 - Housekeeping
We have our 2nd 12 hour stream going down this Friday
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:04:19 - Cory Barlog Thinks God of War Could Lend Itself to a Netflix Series, this comes from Alessio Palumbo of wccftech
00:18:42 - Ori and the WIll of the Wisps has gone gold!, this is from the Ori Twitter
00:20:35 - The industry is becoming more diverse, and more developers support inclusion efforts, this is by Rebekah Valentine of Gamesindustry.biz
https://www.gamesindustry.biz/articles/2020-01-28-the-industry-is-becoming-more-diverse-and-more-developers-support-inclusion-efforts
00:30:15 - Untitled Goose Game Devs Commit 1% Of All Future Earnings To Australian Indigenous Groups, I’m pulling this from James O’Connor over at Gamespot:: -
00:32:52 -'Dauntless' Studio Acquired by Singapore-Based Games Company Garena, this is from Patrick Shanley of The Hollywood Reporter
00:35:25 -Xbox Games with Gold and Playstation Plus games for February have been revealed
00:37:28 - Out today
00:41:35 -  GI JOE: WAR ON COBRA
00:44:58- ROBINHOOD
 Reader mail   -
00:46:00 - It’s 2020: let’s assume we’re entering a new DECADE OF DREAMS! - Marcus Hutchens
00:54:51 - Where is the FF7 demo? - Lee Polero
00:56:35 - Squad Up: Mr Mitch George - Today is Bell Let’s Talk day. For every tweet or retweet of the hashtag #BellLetsTalk on Twitter,
00:58:25 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Tim and Ray Narvaez
